tool.name: Realign reads

param.label: Keep MC, MD, NM, and A flags?
param.help: Re-alignment resets the MC, MD, NM, and A flags by default. The values of these tags depend on the exact alignment. Use this option only if you know what you are doing.

param.name: replace_bq2
param.label: How to handle base qualities of 2?
param.help: In sequenced reads obtained with Illumina sequencing pipelines before version 1.8, base quality 2 is special in that it serves as a general indicator of low quality of the corresponding bases. For such reads, the tool can make an optimistic guess of the real quality of such bases by replacing base qualities of 2 with the median of all other base qualities observed in the read. Alternatively, you can provide a fixed replacement value. For recently obtained sequencing data, just keep BQ2 values unchanged (the default) since they have no special meaning.

param.name: defqual
param.label: Quality to assume for all bases with BQ2
